id.desc: The id of the data, which can be used for reference in other elements

name.desc: The name of the data, which can be used for querying the data

dependency.desc:
Type that can be passed: (IGrammarBase[] | IGrammarBase | string[] | string)

The other elements that the current data depends on, can be the id of the element, or the element itself

values.desc: Raw data configuration, with the highest parsing priority

source.desc: Set the data source that the data depends on Supported types: string | string[] | IData | IData[];

transform-range.desc: Used to create a numeric array from the given start value up to but not including the end value

transform-sort.desc: "sort" is mainly used for sorting data

transform-stack.desc: Perform data stacking for displaying stacked bar charts, stacked area charts, percentage area charts, and more.

transform-pie.desc: Used to calculate the pie layout, implementing common pie charts

transform-funnel.desc: Used for calculating the funnel layout, implementing common funnel charts

transform-circlePacking.desc: Transform hierarchical data and calculate circle packing layout

transform-sankey.desc: Transform hierarchical data and calculate sankey layout

transform-sunburst.desc: Transform the hierarchical data and calculate the sunburst layout.

transform-tree.desc: Transforms hierarchical data and calculates the tree layout

transform-treemap.desc: Transform hierarchical data and calculate treemap layout

transform-wordcloud.desc: Transform hierarchical data and calculate wordcloud layout

transform-wordcloudShape.desc: Transform hierarchical data and calculate wordcloudShape layout
